comments.body: where is the scheduler's api.NewContext set?

Derek and I were going to talk and have context be autoset once it's needed.  So clients that don't know about context or don't care don't have to set it (as appropriate) - clients that do should set it up front.  Not passing context should be equivalent to using the correct default context (which client package probably knows better than the call site).

comments.body: Should this parameter more specifically mention the apiserver as it's name?  The master is slightly less special now, just wondering whether we would prefer "master" generally to refer to the apiserver.
In my head, master == apiserver. I think replication controller has the same flag, we should be consistent.
